Body:
sim_pattern = ci_pattern.CIPatternNonUniform(normalization=100.0, regions=[
    (0, 1, 0, 1)], row_slope=0.0)
non_uniform_charge_region = sim_pattern.simulate_region(region_dimensions=(
    3, 3), ci_seed=1)
assert (non_uniform_charge_region == np.array([[100.0, 100.0, 100.0], [
    100.0, 100.0, 100.0], [100.0, 100.0, 100.0]])).all()
